title: Suggestions for Fonts used in Small Sizes
content:
Hi everyone!

I needed a few suggestions for fonts that can be used in relatively low sizes of 6&7. I have come across two fonts which are clear and maintain the readability. They are the Garamond Premier Pro Caption and ITC Berkeley.

I would really appreciate if some of you can suggest me a few more. Please do mention a few Sans serifs too along with the serifs.

TIA
author: thetypegod
